Reviews.Title: Onebook was disappointing
Reviews.Author: Darla lyons
Reviews.Content: After charging it only worked for five minutes and then shut off never to restart . the keyboard was nice but the case is not made well. I was very disappointed in this purchase because everything I have bought from Amazon has been as good or better than expected. I have asked to return for refund.

Reviews.Title: Okay for the price
Reviews.Author: G. Thomas
Reviews.Content: Okay for the grand kids but the resolution is terrible.  Would not recommend.  I gave it three stars because customer service was outstanding.  Would be okay for the kids to play games and do a little surfing.
